call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - April 10th

decisions.decision: Will put out a community vote to determine Ergo meetup date in Colorado Springs
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Need to decide between first weekend in September or the 10th for Colorado Springs meetup
decisions.quote: I will put out a community vote and see what people want to do

commitments.commitment: RC5 release after two pull requests are approved and merged, which will be identical to final 6.0 release
commitments.quote: once approved and merged, RC5 will be released and yeah, that's basically the final version of 6.0

commitments.commitment: Palmyra launch on August 14th using Rosen Bridge for cross-chain launch on Cardano and BNB
commitments.quote: So, you know, we got the launch on the 14th of August

commitments.commitment: Community chat about high-performance proof-of-work protocols and sub-blocks
commitments.quote: I will be around, I don't know, on Saturday or Sunday, my evening. So let's have some community chats over the Telegram, just text chat maybe about high-performance proof-of-work protocols, sub-blocks, all that stuff

open_questions.question: Need to get Captain Nemo complete list of GraphQL rollover servers for Nautilus
open_questions.context: Two of three load balancers went down, exposed choke points in infrastructure

open_questions.question: Need Marty to work on Paideia front end
open_questions.context: Front end development needed for Paideia

reversals_or_updates.previous: Expected to support Ergo officially at Palmyra launch
reversals_or_updates.update: Cannot officially support Ergo liquidity pools at launch without staking support
reversals_or_updates.reason: Regulatory requirement - need staking support on every chain to maintain utility token classification
reversals_or_updates.speaker: Dan Friedman

key_facts.fact: Emission reduction occurred, now down to 15 ERG per block
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Node 6.0 RC4 successfully synced on mainnet with no errors
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Nodes as old as 5.0.8 and 5.0.9 still active and working
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Seychelles FSA issued first ever utility token license for Palmyra partner company
key_facts.speaker: Dan Friedman

key_facts.fact: Dexy has 15 oracles for gold oracle
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Merkleized Sub-Syntax trees and Merkleized Finite State Machines examples now available in ErgoScript
key_facts.speaker: kushti
